localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Pulse is a private, 27,000+ verified member community for technology leaders to learn from their peers. Members can ask questions, create polls, and engage in conversations for instant insights. Over 16,000+ new data points are gathered each week in Pulse.
blogPost.body: Pulse is a private, 27,000+ verified member community for technology leaders to learn from their peers. Members can ask questions, create polls, and engage in conversations for instant insights. Over 16,000+ new data points are gathered each week in Pulse.
blogPost.title: Pulse - A community for technology leaders to learn from each other
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Pulse是一个私人的、超过27,000名经过验证的会员社区，供技术领导者向同行学习。会员可以提出问题，创建投票，并参与对话以获得即时见解。Pulse每周收集超过16,000+个新数据点。
localize.tagline: 技术领导者相互学习的社区

localize.description: Pulse是一個私人的、超過27,000名經過驗證的會員社區，供技術領導者向同行學習。會員可以提出問題，創建投票，並參與對話以獲得即時見解。Pulse每週收集超過16,000+個新數據點。
localize.tagline: 技術領導者相互學習的社區

previous.excerpt: Listnr helps you start a Podcast in 100+ Voices and 22 languages without recording anything, we use Speech Synthesis technology from Google, Amazon, Microsoft and IBM to power Listnr and deliver great results!
previous.title: Listnr - Start a podcast without recording anything

localize.description: Listnr帮助你以100多种声音和22种语言开始播客，而无需录制任何东西，我们使用谷歌、亚马逊、微软和IBM的语音合成技术为Listnr提供动力，并提供伟大的结果。
localize.tagline: 不需要录制任何东西就能开始播客

localize.description: Listnr幫助你以100多種聲音和22種語言開始播客，而無需錄製任何東西，我們使用谷歌、亞馬遜、微軟和IBM的語音合成技術爲Listnr提供動力，並提供偉大的結果。
localize.tagline: 不需要錄製任何東西就能開始播客
